title: Best Fast-Charging Power Banks for Pixel 9 & Pixel 9 Pro (2025)
description: Here are our top picks for fast, reliable charging power banks on the go for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, and Pixel 9 Pro XL. The post Best Fast-Charging Power Banks for Pixel 9 & Pixel 9 Pro (2025) appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Tyler Lee
excerpt: Here are our top picks for fast, reliable charging power banks on the go for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, and Pixel 9 Pro XL.

If you‚Äôve just picked up a brand new Pixel 9, or you‚Äôre eyeing one on sale, making sure you have a fast, reliable power bank is essential. The Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, and Pixel 9 Pro XL all support high-speed USB-C Power Delivery (PD) charging, which means you‚Äôll want a power bank that can keep up ‚Äî especially if you‚Äôre always on the move. Whether you‚Äôre commuting, traveling, or just need that extra boost during a busy day, the right fast-charging power bank ensures your Pixel stays powered without slowing you down. And if you‚Äôre still hunting for the best deal on Pixel phones, don‚Äôt miss our regularly updated Google Pixel Price Tracker ‚Äî it‚Äôs your one-stop resource for finding the latest discounts across the Pixel lineup. In this guide, we‚Äôve rounded up the best fast-charging power banks for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, and Pixel 9 Pro XL, focusing on models that deliver at least 37W of USB-C PD output to match the Pixel‚Äôs charging capabilities. We‚Äôll cover compact options for everyday carry, high-capacity picks for long trips, and even models with extra features like PPS support for more efficient charging. Pixel 9 Fast Charging Power Bank Comparison Table Power Bank Original Price Discounted Price Capacity Charging Speeds UGREEN Power Bank 25,000mAh 145W $99.99 $74.99 25,000mAh Up to 145W USB-C PD INIU Power Bank 25,000mAh 100W $66.99 $53.98 25,000mAh Up to 100W USB-C PD Anker Power Bank 20,000mAh Travel Essential $59.99 $49.99 20,000mAh Up to 87W USB-C PD (built-in cable) Baseus Power Bank 20,000mAh 65W $79.99 $49.99 20,000mAh Up to 65W USB-C PD SHARGEEK 140 Power Bank 20,000mAh 140W $109.99 $89.99 20,000mAh Up to 140W USB-C PD UGREEN Power Bank 25,000mAh 145W The UGREEN 25,000mAh power bank is an absolute powerhouse, delivering up to 145W via USB-C PD, making it ideal for heavy-duty charging, including laptops and fast-charging your Pixel 9 Pro XL at full speed. With three output ports, including USB-C and USB-A, it‚Äôs versatile enough for charging multiple devices simultaneously. Despite its high capacity, it remains reasonably compact, and PPS support ensures efficient charging for compatible devices. INIU Power Bank 25,000mAh 100W INIU‚Äôs 25,000mAh power bank offers a fantastic balance of power and value, with up to 100W fast charging through USB-C PD. It features a handy digital display that shows real-time power usage and remaining battery, plus multiple ports for charging several devices at once. It comfortably supports the Pixel 9 series while also being a great companion for tablets and even smaller laptops. Anker Power Bank 20,000mAh Travel Essential Anker‚Äôs 20,000mAh Travel Essential power bank is a great pick for everyday use, especially thanks to its built-in USB-C cable, which cuts down on extra clutter when you‚Äôre on the go. It supports up to 87W fast charging, which is sufficient for the Pixel 9 but won‚Äôt max out the Pixel 9 Pro XL‚Äôs potential speeds. Anker‚Äôs trusted build quality and compact design make this an easy, reliable choice for travel or daily carry. Baseus Power Bank 20,000mAh 65W The Baseus 20,000mAh 65W power bank strikes an excellent balance between affordability and performance. Its sleek metal design houses serious charging power, capable of 65W output via USB-C PD, which easily handles the Pixel 9 series and can even top up lightweight laptops. With multiple ports and PPS support, it‚Äôs a versatile option for users who want strong performance without breaking the bank. SHARGEEK 140 Power Bank 20,000mAh 140W For those who want power and style, the SHARGEEK 140 Power Bank delivers both. With up to 140W output, it‚Äôs one of the most powerful options on the list, and its transparent casing with a smart digital display gives it a unique, techy aesthetic. Ideal for Pixel 9 Pro XL owners looking for premium performance, it can handle your phone, laptop, and more, all with fast, efficient charging. How We Chose These Power Banks When selecting the best fast-charging power banks for the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro, we focused on a few key criteria to make sure you get the best charging experience possible: Fast Charging Compatibility The Pixel 9 Pro XL supports up to 37W USB-C PD 3.0 charging, so we prioritized power banks that can deliver at least this output. Models with higher wattage (like 65W or even 140W) offer future-proofing and can also charge laptops or other high-demand devices. USB-C Power Delivery (PD) Support Since Pixel phones use USB-C PD as the standard for fast charging, we only included power banks that offer reliable USB-C PD output. This ensures fast, safe, and consistent charging speeds. Battery Capacity We chose a range of power banks from 20,000mAh to 25,000mAh, providing enough capacity for multiple full charges of your Pixel 9 ‚Äî perfect for travel, commuting, or heavy daily use. üîç Deals change fast! html:
üïí Last checked on April 7, 2025 ‚Äî Price and availability confirmed at time of writing.

If you‚Äôve just picked up a brand new Pixel 9, or you‚Äôre eyeing one on sale, making sure you have a fast, reliable power bank is essential. The Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, and Pixel 9 Pro XL all support high-speed USB-C Power Delivery (PD) charging, which means you‚Äôll want a power bank that can keep up ‚Äî especially if you‚Äôre always on the move. Whether you‚Äôre commuting, traveling, or just need that extra boost during a busy day, the right fast-charging power bank ensures your Pixel stays powered without slowing you down.

And if you‚Äôre still hunting for the best deal on Pixel phones, don‚Äôt miss our regularly updated Google Pixel Price Tracker ‚Äî it‚Äôs your one-stop resource for finding the latest discounts across the Pixel lineup.

In this guide, we‚Äôve rounded up the best fast-charging power banks for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, and Pixel 9 Pro XL, focusing on models that deliver at least 37W of USB-C PD output to match the Pixel‚Äôs charging capabilities. We‚Äôll cover compact options for everyday carry, high-capacity picks for long trips, and even models with extra features like PPS support for more efficient charging.

Pixel 9 Fast Charging Power Bank Comparison Table

Power Bank Original Price Discounted Price Capacity Charging Speeds
UGREEN Power Bank 25,000mAh 145W $99.99 $74.99 25,000mAh Up to 145W USB-C PD
INIU Power Bank 25,000mAh 100W $66.99 $53.98 25,000mAh Up to 100W USB-C PD
Anker Power Bank 20,000mAh Travel Essential $59.99 $49.99 20,000mAh Up to 87W USB-C PD (built-in cable)
Baseus Power Bank 20,000mAh 65W $79.99 $49.99 20,000mAh Up to 65W USB-C PD
SHARGEEK 140 Power Bank 20,000mAh 140W $109.99 $89.99 20,000mAh Up to 140W USB-C PD

UGREEN Power Bank 25,000mAh 145W

The UGREEN 25,000mAh power bank is an absolute powerhouse, delivering up to 145W via USB-C PD, making it ideal for heavy-duty charging, including laptops and fast-charging your Pixel 9 Pro XL at full speed. With three output ports, including USB-C and USB-A, it‚Äôs versatile enough for charging multiple devices simultaneously. Despite its high capacity, it remains reasonably compact, and PPS support ensures efficient charging for compatible devices.

INIU Power Bank 25,000mAh 100W

INIU‚Äôs 25,000mAh power bank offers a fantastic balance of power and value, with up to 100W fast charging through USB-C PD. It features a handy digital display that shows real-time power usage and remaining battery, plus multiple ports for charging several devices at once. It comfortably supports the Pixel 9 series while also being a great companion for tablets and even smaller laptops.

Anker Power Bank 20,000mAh Travel Essential

Anker‚Äôs 20,000mAh Travel Essential power bank is a great pick for everyday use, especially thanks to its built-in USB-C cable, which cuts down on extra clutter when you‚Äôre on the go. It supports up to 87W fast charging, which is sufficient for the Pixel 9 but won‚Äôt max out the Pixel 9 Pro XL‚Äôs potential speeds. Anker‚Äôs trusted build quality and compact design make this an easy, reliable choice for travel or daily carry.

Baseus Power Bank 20,000mAh 65W

The Baseus 20,000mAh 65W power bank strikes an excellent balance between affordability and performance. Its sleek metal design houses serious charging power, capable of 65W output via USB-C PD, which easily handles the Pixel 9 series and can even top up lightweight laptops. With multiple ports and PPS support, it‚Äôs a versatile option for users who want strong performance without breaking the bank.

SHARGEEK 140 Power Bank 20,000mAh 140W

For those who want power and style, the SHARGEEK 140 Power Bank delivers both. With up to 140W output, it‚Äôs one of the most powerful options on the list, and its transparent casing with a smart digital display gives it a unique, techy aesthetic. Ideal for Pixel 9 Pro XL owners looking for premium performance, it can handle your phone, laptop, and more, all with fast, efficient charging.

How We Chose These Power Banks

When selecting the best fast-charging power banks for the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro, we focused on a few key criteria to make sure you get the best charging experience possible:

Fast Charging Compatibility

The Pixel 9 Pro XL supports up to 37W USB-C PD 3.0 charging, so we prioritized power banks that can deliver at least this output. Models with higher wattage (like 65W or even 140W) offer future-proofing and can also charge laptops or other high-demand devices.

USB-C Power Delivery (PD) Support

Since Pixel phones use USB-C PD as the standard for fast charging, we only included power banks that offer reliable USB-C PD output. This ensures fast, safe, and consistent charging speeds.

Battery Capacity

We chose a range of power banks from 20,000mAh to 25,000mAh, providing enough capacity for multiple full charges of your Pixel 9 ‚Äî perfect for travel, commuting, or heavy daily use.
